message.content:
cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.PL

This paper proposes the use of automated planning agents to simulate human behavior in games, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses game balance and design flaws, which are topics related to game theory (cs.GT). The use of metrics to evaluate game design is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and simulation (cs.SI). Finally, the paper mentions a collectible card game, which is a type of game that often involves programming and logic (cs.PL).
